definition: to infer/to consider and come to a judgment/to recommend/to estimate/deduced to be
to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: The rule reflects how well the democracy goes in a country.
sentences.chinese: 無罪推定體現了一個國家法制民主文明化的程度。

sentences.english: The second part mainly discusses the basis of justifiability of the presumptive consent.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分主要探討了推定的承諾的正當化根據。

sentences.english: No punishment for doubtful case of crime is a reflection of substantial disposition in case of doctrine of the presumption of innocence.
sentences.chinese: 疑罪從無是無罪推定原則在案件的實體處理上的體現。

sentences.english: The same presumption of innocence goes for copyright and privacy .
sentences.chinese: 同樣的無罪推定適用於版權和隱私領域。

sentences.english: Presumption of guilty is the thought root which many criminal miscarriage cases produce.
sentences.chinese: 有罪推定是諸多冤錯案件產生的思想根源。

sentences.english: Presumption is an important institution of the law of evidence.
sentences.chinese: 推定是證據法中的一項重要制度。
帕梅拉推定，“從根本上講，別去公開分享這些信息。

sentences.english: The presumed additive effect of seizures has not been decisively clarified.
sentences.chinese: 推定的加性效應的緝獲沒有果斷澄清。

sentences.english: The court presumes the maintenance payments are being paid on time.
sentences.chinese: 法院推定扶養費是按時支付的。

sentences.english: ' asks Mr. Wong. 'You can never pass the 'benefit of doubt' test.
sentences.chinese: 如果這樣做，你永遠無法通過“無罪推定”的測試。

sentences.english: Presumptive victim's commitment is a cause of justification under special circumstance.
sentences.chinese: 推定的被害人承諾是特殊情況下的正當化事由。

sentences.english: First introduced the innocent estimation form characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 首先介紹了無罪推定的形式特徵。

sentences.english: And Congress comes to the Supreme Court with a presumption of deference and constitutionality.
sentences.chinese: 和國會的尊重和合憲性推定帶有一個最高法院。

sentences.english: Duplications of archives shall be presumed as authentic if its authenticity has been verified by the agency storing it.
sentences.chinese: 其複製品經管理該檔案機關確認者，推定其爲真正。

sentences.english: The Named Insured shall have the right to claim for a Partial Loss in lieu of a Constructive Total Loss.
sentences.chinese: 被保人有權根據推定全損對部分損失提出索賠。

sentences.english: This evidence supports my argument that she is guilty.
sentences.chinese: 這一證據支持了我認爲她有罪的推定。

definition: to maintain (that sth is true)/to determine (a fact)/determination (of an amount)/of the firm opinion/to believe firmly/to set one's mind on/to identify with
according to this/on the ground of the above/(formally introduces reported speech in writing)
to state explicitly in writing/to specify/to stipulate
probative value/strength of evidence in legal proof/relevance
to counter accusations/to protest/to remonstrate/to retort/to plead/to demur/a plea (of not guilty)/a defense (against an allegation)/to enter a plea to a charge (in a law court)
